entries.cant_work: Step back soon, friend, when you're not busy. Smooth out and slack back.
entries.dontknowyou_1: You've got the wrong person, friend.
entries.dontknowyou_2: I am waiting for another individual.
entries.gotowork_1: What exactly are you waiting for?
entries.gotowork_2: I expected a package from Sigrix full of -- not spice, what did he say it was? -- ah, a Selonian verovakin, yes.
entries.next: All is smooth, friend. No tasks trouble the unrippled calm of the mind's landscape.
entries.notit_1: You lack the slack, friend -- this is not the ambient wildlife calls I need.
entries.npc_1_1: Smooth it and seat it, my friend. I'm big in fizz. I got a friend making recordings for me, and you could do me a real good turn, picking-them-up-wise. Interested?
entries.npc_1_2: Smooth and slack, friend. I made some lissome fizz using a Selonian verovakin for harmony. I need to get it back to its owner. You game for the dropoff?
entries.npc_2_1: Smooth. They're wildlife calls recorded live, so my friend is in the wilderness. Watch out for those animals, now.
entries.npc_2_2: Yes indeed, you are a smooth mover. You want a Selonian named Wooral. The verovakin is in this container. Don't worry if it sounds like spice when you shake it, that's just padding material.
entries.npc_3_1: No? How un-smooth. You lack the slack, friend.
entries.npc_4_1: They're the beautiful calls of native Talus wildlife, lovingly recorded in the wilderness by a skilled engineer. They've got a happy path as overtones to my next piece. Can you nab these sweet sounds?
entries.npc_4_2: A tiny little twangy thing the Selonians play with the claws on their toes. I hear the males use it to entice the ladies. Wouldn't know myself. Care to return it to its owner?
entries.npc_backtowork_1: The way lies clear, friend. Got to have those wildlife recordings.
entries.npc_backtowork_2: The way is smooth, friend. Take that verovakin back to Wooral.
entries.npc_breech_1: You here from that musician, Sigrix Slix?
entries.npc_breech_2: I am waiting for a delivery from Sigrix Slix! Is that you?
entries.npc_failure_1: You didn't bring the stuff -- I mean, the recordings? That is so un-smooth. I'll be lacking my slack now.
entries.npc_failure_2: You didn't get that stuff -- that verovakin back to Wooral? Oh, very un-smooth. Gotta work up another delivery soonest.
entries.npc_more_1_1: Huh? Oh! Oh, of course, the wildlife calls. Here, this container is full of high-quality wildlife calls. Take it to Sigrix, he'll love it. Them.
entries.npc_more_1_2: Yes, all right, musical instrument. Whatever he likes to call it. I only know my buyers need this container urgently.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Soon I'll hear from my friend where his wanderings have taken him. Check back with me.
entries.npc_noloc_2: Wooral will call with the place for the happy return. Check with me soon.
entries.npc_reset_1: Smooth, friend. Check back when you can.
entries.npc_reward_1: Hmm? My friend said this was glitterstim spice? Ha. That noober. Here, friend, glom some creds and check back soon.
entries.npc_reward_2: Smooth, friend. Glad you returned that verovakin. Wooral thought that was spice? These aliens -- so strange. Can't figure them out.
entries.npc_smuggle_1: He's gonna love this stuff. This is 99 percent pure, this is. What a high!
entries.npc_smuggle_2: This is -- what? -- a Selonian verovakin? As you say. Sigrix will pay you, I am sure.
entries.npc_work_1: Friend, my music waits. It wants those wildlife calls. Hope you can get them soon.
entries.npc_work_2: The way is smooth, friend. Take that verovakin back to Wooral.
entries.player_more_1_1: Wait -- I thought I was picking up recorded sounds of ambient wildlife calls.
entries.player_more_1_2: You don't seem to recognize this musical instrument, but Sigrix said he borrowed it from you.
entries.player_reset_1: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_1: I'll keep working on the mission.
entries.return_waypoint_description_1: This famous fizz musician is supposedly waiting for a friend's recordings of ambient wildlife calls.
entries.return_waypoint_description_2: This fizz musician in Nashal is awaiting news of the delivery he arranged to a Selonian named Wooral, allegedly of a musical instrument called a verovakin.
entries.waypoint_description_1: Nashal musician Sigrix Slix wants a friend's recordings of ambient wildlife calls made here.
entries.waypoint_description_2: This Selonian is waiting for a container from Nashal fizz musician Sigrix Slix, supposedly containing a musical instrument called a verovakin.
entries.npc_reset_2: Smooth, friend. Check back when you can.
entries.player_reset_2: I don't want this mission right now.
entries.player_sorry_2: I'll keep working on the mission.
